name: Just Assault
description:
The year is 2078, the Nazis continue to expand to other countries, starting from Europe, Asia and the American continent, like waves that seem unstoppable. There are countries that accept voluntarily, some reject it. Those who accept are left as before, but those who refuse are destroyed like leaves lying on the road. 

When all hope seems to have vanished, a person appears who is ready to reject the regime. What's the next story? Let's play this game together. While you are playing this game, please find a photo related to the Nazis, you must know what I'm talking about.
